name: Vepian's Shining Force Model
description:
WARNING!

Very specific model!

Model trained on official SEGA arts for games ""Shining Force" and "Shining Force II".

  1. Perfect style representation 👍👍👍

  2. Bad faces and anatomy (cause source images are not very good) 👎👎👎

  3. Excellent with concept of Centaur 👍👍👍

  4. VAE baked in 👍👍👍

  5. Loves to crop characters 👎👎👎

Created mostly as an experiment. Please, check out my other models, I sure you'll like them.

meta.negativePrompt: Deformed, bad anatomy, disfigured, poorly drawn face, mutation, mutated, extra limb, ugly, disgusting, poorly drawn hands, missing limb, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, malformed hands, blurry, ((((mutated hands and fingers)))), watermark, oversaturated, b&w, black and white, extra persons, asian, (green hair), red dress
